title: Launcher not launching client
body:
Whenever I load league of legends, the patcher/launcher loads and downloads fine it's getting into the login screen that's the issue.
When I click "launch" it can take anywhere from 5-10 Minutes for the EULA to appear even if i've already accepted it. After the EULA appears and I click "I agree", it takes another 5-10 Minutes for the second one to appear after that is done, it will just stay on the client not  launching the login screen, this can last anywhere from 20 minutes to 1 hour.

replies.body:
My computer specs are as follows:
Intel Core i7-4900MQ CPU @ 2.80 GHz (8 Processors)
32.0 GB Ram
Windows 8.1 x64
Nvidia GeForce GTX 780M
ISP: Optus

Please use the "Reply" function of the boards, otherwise I won't get notification of your response. It's located right under the message you want to reply to. Remember, this is no longer the boards.

Your setup is not the issue here; you're using known brands of top quality. Maybe Windows 8.1 just sucks, but some might beg to differ.

Does your computer struggle to load regular web pages? Do you lag at all while in games?

Oh thank you sorry about that.
I don't lag at all, The only lag i get is latency

Just trying to eliminate any obvious reason here. You would not believe how many times I've spent hours of troubleshooting and hacking config files just to find out that my mouse wasn't connected to the computer properly, ugh.

Have you tried cleaning your registry with something like CCleaner, and then defragging your hard-drive?
That is one I haven't heard before. What's your computer specs? What OS and ISP do you have?
